m_szDocTitle: 5 stocks Wall Street is betting will tank - Apr. 9, 2015
m_szDocSumamry: 5 stocks Wall Street is betting will tank by Matt Egan Â  @mattmegan5 April 9, 2015: 12:51 PM ET Petrobras used to be the crown jewel of Brazil. Now it's a symbol for the country's rapid decline. Not only is the oil giant the epicenter of a massive corruption scandal, it's the focal point of short sellers on Wall Street who believe its shares will continue to crumble. The scandal may also force Petrobras ( PBR ) to take huge writedowns on the value of assets that may have been inflated. Petrobras has also been slammed by Brazil's plummeting currency as well as the dramatic plunge in oil prices,
